text: Photinia villosa is a species in the flowering plant family Rosaceae, with common names Christmas berry and oriental photinia. It is a shrub or small tree up to tall, native to China, Japan, and Korea. == Varieties == * Photinia villosa var. coreana (Decne.) Rehder — Korean photinia * Photinia villosa var. laevis (Thunb.) Dippel — smooth oriental photinia * Photinia villosa var. sinica Rehder & E.H.Wilson ==References== villosa
title: Photinia villosa
